titleStmt.title: By his Majesties authority. These are to give notice unto all persons, that there is arrived in this place John Newman, a legal and approved practitioner in physick ...
titleStmt.author: Newman, John, doctor.

notesStmt.note: With royal coat of arms at head.
Imperfect: torn at right corner of verso with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
